com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.interfaces
Interface IInputConverter

All Known Implementing Classes:
InputConverter, KeyInputConverter, MouseInputConverter
public interface IInputConverter

IInputConverter defines the interface for converters that converts jME input events to FengGUI events.

IInputConverter only converts the input events to the set FengGUI Display instance. It maintains a reference to the Display instance that should receive the converted FengGUI events.

IInputConverter can be disabled manually to stop the conversion from jME input events to FengGUI events. This method can be used to disable all the current displaying GUI.

Version:
Creation date: 07-09-2008 11:01 EST, Modified date: 07-21-2008 12:10 EST
Author:
Yi Wang (Neakor)
